languages.text: {n}Давя довольную улыбку, Владайм произносит:{/n} "Что ж, наводить порядок и марать руки я умею. Раз у меня получалось это в масштабах станции, с парой палуб я как-нибудь управлюсь. Все ради искупления, конечно же. Я смиренно принимаю приговор".

traits.locale_text: {n}Давя довольную улыбку, Владайм произносит:{/n} "Что ж, наводить порядок и марать руки я умею. Раз у меня получалось это в масштабах станции, с парой палуб я как-нибудь управлюсь. Все ради искупления, конечно же. Я смиренно принимаю приговор".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym suppresses a contented smile and says,{/n} "Well, I'm good at putting things in order and getting my hands dirty. I did that for an entire station, so I think I can handle a couple of ship decks. All for the sake of my atonement, of course. I humbly accept my sentence."

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆努力克制住满足的微笑。{/n}“好吧，我很擅长把事情安排得井井有条，也很擅长干脏活。整座星站的脏活我都干过，所以船上的几层甲板也应该不成问题。当然，这一切都是为了赎罪，我虚心接受我的判决。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym suppresses a contented smile and says,{/n} "Well, I'm good at putting things in order and getting my hands dirty. I did that for an entire station, so I think I can handle a couple of ship decks. All for the sake of my atonement, of course. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆努力克制住满足的微笑。{/n}“好吧，我很擅长把事情安排得井井有条，也很擅长干脏活。整座星站的脏活我都干过，所以船上的几层甲板也应该不成问题。当然，这一切都是为了赎罪，我虚心接受我的判决。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは満足気な笑みをなんとか抑え、こう言った。{/n}「まあ、整理整頓や自分の手を汚すのは得意なのでね。ステーション全体をそうしてきたし、船のデッキ数個ぐらいなら対処できるだろう。もちろん、全ては私の償いの為さ。喜んで刑を受け入れよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym suppresses a contented smile and says,{/n} "Well, I'm good at putting things in order and getting my hands dirty. I did that for an entire station, so I think I can handle a couple of ship decks. All for the sake of my atonement, of course. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは満足気な笑みをなんとか抑え、こう言った。{/n}「まあ、整理整頓や自分の手を汚すのは得意なのでね。ステーション全体をそうしてきたし、船のデッキ数個ぐらいなら対処できるだろう。もちろん、全ては私の償いの為さ。喜んで刑を受け入れよう」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym reprime una sonrisa de satisfacción y dice:{/n} «Bueno, se me da bien poner orden y ensuciarme las manos. Me encargué de toda una estación, así que creo que un par de cubiertas no serán un problema. Todo por el bien de mi expiación, por supuesto. Acepto humildemente mi sentencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym suppresses a contented smile and says,{/n} "Well, I'm good at putting things in order and getting my hands dirty. I did that for an entire station, so I think I can handle a couple of ship decks. All for the sake of my atonement, of course. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym reprime una sonrisa de satisfacción y dice:{/n} «Bueno, se me da bien poner orden y ensuciarme las manos. Me encargué de toda una estación, así que creo que un par de cubiertas no serán un problema. Todo por el bien de mi expiación, por supuesto. Acepto humildemente mi sentencia».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym unterdrückt ein zufriedenes Grinsen und sagt:{/n} "Nun, ich bin recht gut darin, Dinge wieder in Ordnung zu bringen und mir die Hände schmutzig zu machen. Das habe ich bereits für eine ganze Station getan, dann werde ich mit ein paar Schiffsdecks wohl keine Schwierigkeiten haben. Alles natürlich, um Buße zu tun. Ich nehme meine Strafe demütigst an."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym suppresses a contented smile and says,{/n} "Well, I'm good at putting things in order and getting my hands dirty. I did that for an entire station, so I think I can handle a couple of ship decks. All for the sake of my atonement, of course. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym unterdrückt ein zufriedenes Grinsen und sagt:{/n} "Nun, ich bin recht gut darin, Dinge wieder in Ordnung zu bringen und mir die Hände schmutzig zu machen. Das habe ich bereits für eine ganze Station getan, dann werde ich mit ein paar Schiffsdecks wohl keine Schwierigkeiten haben. Alles natürlich, um Buße zu tun. Ich nehme meine Strafe demütigst an."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym réprime un sourire satisfait et déclare :{/n} « Ma foi, je suis doué pour remettre de l'ordre et je n'ai pas peur de me salir les mains. Je l'ai fait pour toute une station, alors je devrais bien pouvoir m'occuper de quelques ponts. Tout cela au nom de mon expiation, bien sûr. J'accepte humblement ma sentence. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym suppresses a contented smile and says,{/n} "Well, I'm good at putting things in order and getting my hands dirty. I did that for an entire station, so I think I can handle a couple of ship decks. All for the sake of my atonement, of course. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym réprime un sourire satisfait et déclare :{/n} « Ma foi, je suis doué pour remettre de l'ordre et je n'ai pas peur de me salir les mains. Je l'ai fait pour toute une station, alors je devrais bien pouvoir m'occuper de quelques ponts. Tout cela au nom de mon expiation, bien sûr. J'accepte humblement ma sentence. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, tatminkâr gülümsemesini bastırmaya çalışarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Eh, bir şeyleri düzene sokmakta ve ellerimi kirletmekte iyiyimdir. Bunu koca bir istasyon için yaptıktan sonra birkaç gemi güvertesini de halledebilirim diye düşünüyorum. Hepsi de ceza olarak elbette. Cezamı alçak gönüllülükle kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym suppresses a contented smile and says,{/n} "Well, I'm good at putting things in order and getting my hands dirty. I did that for an entire station, so I think I can handle a couple of ship decks. All for the sake of my atonement, of course. I humbly accept my sentence."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym, tatmin olmuş gülümsemesini bastırmaya çalışarak konuşuyor:{/n} "Eh, bir şeyleri düzene sokmakta ve ellerimi kirletmekte iyiyimdir. Bunu koca bir istasyon için yaptıktan sonra birkaç gemi güvertesini de hâlledebilirim diye düşünüyorum. Hepsi de ceza olarak elbette. Cezamı alçak gönüllülükle kabul ediyorum."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
